<title level="1" right="Rules">[Consumable Magic Items](/Rules.aspx?ID=246)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 293 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
You can typically purchase _holy_ and _unholy water_ in a settlement. Particularly good settlements tend to ban _unholy water_ and evil settlements tend to ban _holy water_.

 [_Holy Water_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=245), [_Unholy Water_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=248)
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
